Camp.title: Tenkhleg Camp
Camp.description: Experience the beauty of nature and relax in a peaceful environment at Tenkhleg Camp. Our traditional Mongolian gers offer an authentic taste of nomadic culture and lifestyle, with plenty of opportunities for hiking, fishing, and other outdoor activities.

Gallery.title: Unforgettable Memories
Gallery.description: Capture the magic of Khuvsgul Lake and create memories that will last a lifetime at Tenkhleg Resort.

Rooms.title: Our Rooms
Rooms.description: Experience authentic Mongolian hospitality in our comfortable accommodations, from traditional gers to modern lakeside rooms.

1-bed.title: 1 Bed
1-bed.description: A cozy room with one bed, perfect for solo travelers.

2-bed.title: 2 Bed
2-bed.description: A comfortable room with two beds, ideal for couples or friends.

big-1.title: Big room 1
big-1.description: A spacious room with four beds, great for families or small groups.

big-2.title: Big room 2
big-2.description: Our largest room with six beds, perfect for large families or groups.

lux-1.title: Lux 1
lux-1.description: A luxurious room with one bed and premium amenities.

lux-2.title: Lux 2
lux-2.description: A luxurious room with two beds and premium amenities.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: A standard room with all the essentials for a comfortable stay.

About.title: About Our Hotel
About.description1: Tenkhleg Hotel is located in the city of Murun, the center of Khuvsgul province. We provide a comfortable and convenient stay for travelers.
About.description2: We blend traditional Mongolian hospitality with modern amenities. Our rooms are designed for your comfort and relaxation.
About.description3: Explore the city and its surroundings from our central location. Our restaurant serves delicious local and international dishes. Enjoy your stay with us!

About.title: About Our Resort
About.description1: Tenkhleg Resort is your luxurious getaway in Murun, Khuvsgul. We offer comfortable lodges, hot water, a restaurant, and various outdoor activities.
About.description2: Nestled by the pristine Khuvsgul Lake, our resort offers a perfect blend of nature and comfort.
About.description3: Enjoy a variety of activities such as hiking, fishing, and horse riding. Our resort is the perfect place to unwind and reconnect with nature.

PopularPlaces.title: Our Popular Places
PopularPlaces.description: Discover the stunning beauty of Khuvsgul Lake and its surrounding attractions that make Tenkhleg Resort the perfect destination.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: Our hotel is located in Murun city, Khuvsgul. Get in touch to book your stay.

Footer.title: Tenkhleg Resort
Footer.description: Experience the beauty of Khuvsgul Lake with us.

AboutPage.title: The Best Service in Murun
AboutPage.description: Tenkhleg Hotel is in Murun, the heart of Khuvsgul province. We offer great service and a comfortable stay. Enjoy our restaurant and modern amenities.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: Our hotel is in Murun, Khuvsgul. Contact us to book your stay.

HotelInfo.title: Our Services
HotelInfo.description: We offer a variety of services to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. Our hotel features a restaurant, conference room, and more.
